case_circumstances: The decedent was found on a creek bank in a decomposed state.  He had the phone number of a cab co. and a driver name in his pocket.  The cab driver knew him as a customer, but didn't know his name.
case_head_hair: short straight gray and brown hair with frontal pattern baldness.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_on_body: Red plaid western-style shirt size medium, white t-shirt with red neck and sleeve trim, two pairs of white socks, white briefs.
case_clothing_with_body: Near the body were found blue jeans Levi's brand,  tooled leather belt and decorative metal buckle, blue comb, red bandana, plain tan Western boots, white straw Western hat. Hat is size 7, Milan style, from Peter Bros.(Fort Worth store).
case_footwear: two pairs of white socks; plain tan Western boots nearby
case_other_items_with_body: white straw Western hat. Hat is size 7, Milan style, from Peter Bros.(Fort Worth store).
dental: Dental information / charting is available and will be entered later
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
